description:
A rival appears for Big Money Company! Lead by Hana Akinai, their name is "Money-grubbing Corporation." Hana has cultivated the girl`s "Detention Club," where they study with their clients into a huge success. Since Kaito hates to lose this gets his competitive streak all fired up. He starts the "Big Money Detention Club," but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Detention Panic! Black Cat Shadow Kitty!!
居残り大パニック ￥ 黒猫シャドーキティ!!
